remarks: Subtraction in a ring, in terms of addition and negation.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)
statement:
ringnegcl.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringnegcl.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
ringnegcl.3 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
ringsub.4 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
rngosub $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( A G ( N ` B ) ) ) $.
